full_text:
I apologize, but the provided HTML appears to be a landing page or listing of fact-check articles, not a specific fact-check article content. This HTML represents a page showing multiple fact-check story previews, advertisements, and navigation elements. 

To extract a specific fact-check article's content, you would need to provide the HTML for the individual fact-check story page. The current HTML does not contain the detailed text of any specific fact-check investigation.

If you'd like me to process a fact-check article's full content, please share the HTML for the specific article page you're interested in analyzing.
title:
Hello sir/madam

I am from the fact check team and all the members of the AajTak AFWA team are constantly working to verify claims sent by users like you, but we will only be able to verify any information for you once you send it through the bot so kindly follow the steps as told by our bot and rest assured we will surely get back to you with the fact check report as per your request. Thank you!
